name: imim2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(w2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w1))
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(w2, w1)))

comment: A closed form of syllogism (see ~ syl ). Theorem *2.05 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 100. Its associated inference is ~ imim2i . Its associated deduction is ~ imim2d . An alternate proof from more basic results is given by ~ ax-1 followed by ~ a2d . (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-1992.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 6-Sep-2012.)
